comments.body: I thought the textures looked great.
Love the texture pack but when turning off pack it keeps some blocks textured as modern and even after deactiving the pack still appears active on my world?
I overall like the pack but I find it weird how to trees aren’t all green. I like the idea of different colors on trees but it makes the game have a fall look. I think only green would look better.

The texture pack now crashes my game and I can no longer use it. Further more enter my world unless I back it up with out the shader. Great textures hoping for texture pack to be updated. I paid for something I can't use.
I dont like the textures of the mobs and the armors, that's horrible!!!

I love so much about this pack. The blocks are beautiful, the variety of windows sis fantastic! Unfortunately the pure white chests and too white bookshelves look terrible. They don't mesh well with the other blocks, and it makes me not want to use it. I'm bummed because everything else is so great looking. Especially love the whitewashed brick look of smooth quartz.

I am in LOVE with this texture pack. The only issue I’m having is that out of the realm the clear glass panes are completely smooth, but in the realm they look like white bars, which is very odd. I can’t seem to find any info on why this is happening and why there’s a difference in and out of the realm.

i brought this pack i was well buzzing cause i have seen this pack many time but it is very buggy and glitchy and the glass needs to be fixed as the colours are not what they show in the HD pack this is the only one i habe found for ps4 i been waitin along time believe me i love the pack makes my city ive built look amazing but just want the windows updated as i have skyscrappers the lot in my city so i need all the colours to be correct on this pack or i just wasted my money on this and that isnt right i was so buzzed to share this with everyone but now i cant cause there is alot of things that have gone wrong my buildings that have blue and white stained glass now have bars all over the windows this is not like the normal HD flow pack as all windows are the original colours and they r all see throw wearthy PLEASE FIX I REALLY LOVE THIS PACK BUT JUST THEM ISSUES

seit dem letzten texturen update sehen die wirrblöcke so aus wie in den anderen ich hatte mir einen ganze welt aufgebaut und in den meisten war die schönere wirrblock textur und die quartziegel konnte man vor dem texturen update super als gehweg benutzen doch jetzt nur noch dieses dumme weis. Also wer sich das design ausgesucht hat der sollte sich mal überlegen ob er vielleicht nicht das alte design dalassen konnte.
I want it too :(

It would be nice actually, a touhou Collab, maybe consisting of the characters reimu, Marisa, cirno, Hong meiling, patchouli knowledge, sakuya izayoi, remilia scarelt, flandre scarlet

And a second part could have some of the smaller yet just as popular characters like youmu, yukari and so on
I want to buy it

Hey, if you're wondering why you don't have any votes, it's because most of the people on Minecraft Feedback ONLY speak English, so I would recommend using a translator.
That’s a spam post!
Was enjoying this game until it started locking up with  the cash on auto going up. Tried to go to an early backup, got back to infinity then before reaching 4200 cash it locked up.

Leider ist seit dem letzten Update vor einigen Tagen, einiges sehr nervig. Alle meine Leute mit der xbox x/s können keine Welt mehr von mir besuchen da die neue xnox kein Update vom texturpaket macht. Und der Ofen zeigt nicht mehr an wie viel Rest Feuer noch drin ist.
I thought you already could do this?
Los capas son algo especial y no es algo que se tiene que dar o vender así nomas
جدا جميل
Vamos jogar juntas

I bought this for the purpose of having the resources for a build. I can only add the textures to a creative world. The entries resources is not showing. I was going to just create the resort world as flat but it will not change. I then planned to just create with the template and end crystal everything but blocks do now blow up. Is there a way I can use the spawns in a creative mode to create my own world?
If the skin was available on the marketplace and was removed I would suggest contacting the creator/ team who published it if you'd like more information.

My daughter and I LOVE this pack. However, we are seeing an issue on IOS that when we use fertilizer the game freezes. I thought it was because we had poor memory in our ipads, but once the other apps were deleted, the problem continued to happen. 5 stars for the game, but this issue is making us stop playing because of this one issue.
Mine doesnt work I'm on ps4 and it doesnt work at all it doesnt load the resource pack and it doesnt work if they can fix this I would be happy

I wish they would also tell us if it supports mobs before we purchase. I was looking for some furniture packs to amp up my game tonight and was disappointed when I went to play with the furniture and realized that the world didn’t support mobs. I feel like taking out crafting and mobs defeats the purpose of Minecraft. I mean more power to you if all you want to do is decorate, but some of us want to decorate and do regular Minecraft things!
A quick label for "Multiplayer" would be helpful for buyers and sellers alike, I think.
I want everything to be free because I have zero mindcoins
Lags to much when using the big machines. Can't use them then it's not worth it. Fix or refund
Wasn't what i expected and crash most of the time. I wouldn't recommend this.

Yeah this is really upsetting and disappointing. I bought it for 990 tokens I believe and loaded up the world to have it just lagging constantly making it unplayable and my friends joining to a white screen. It's an absolute waste of tokens and I'd appreciate a refund if possible .

Crashed a few times, the map that did work, i wasn't able to mine blocks. The diggers aren't very usfull, faster to did regularly. Haven't played it for months, id definitely like to get my money back.

This world is awful. It sometimes works for like a couple of minutes but then crashes the game. Then when you reload it you can’t mine anything. The machines aren’t even the best at times. Especially starting out. I would almost prefer to just use my pick axe but it doesn’t let you even place a torch.

I just bought this pack and I would not recommend someone to get it. If you can even get throught the loading in you are met with an ABSOLUTE lag fest making it barely playable and if you made the same unfortunate mistake as me I would recommend a refund.

I tinkered with this forever, love the concept and the gameplay was well done, but everytime I get ahead I get a paperweight miner meaning it just stops working (new keys, reloads, refuels even changed upgrades to no avail)forcing me to purchase a new one. Now that I have 4 upgraded and sitting in a graveyard dead on my 3rd new world I'm coming here to complain. refunds should be granted as this is completly busted.
In the short run before they die, Crushers create such a load on the system that the screen just blanks and you steer by psychic instinct
Very upset that I spent money on this pack. Won’t let you progress at all before crashing and failing to load part of the map.

Just bought and was initially super excited. But not anymore. It is an absolute lag generator. Can't even walk without the graphics constantly playing catch up. Love the concept but 990 tokens ( ≈ $5.99) is not worth barely being able to interact with the world. Trying for a refund.

Unplayable, lags on lowest graphics and I even have a PS4 Pro.
Anyone lucky enough to read this, don't buy it. The mod pack has too many bugs, it didn't port well at all. Share this to keep let other console crafters before it's too late.
My money back now yellow circle many 8000

Extremely disappointed. Just purchased this game for my kid for $8.49 CAD and it crashes every time within 1min of loading. Basically have enough time to get excited that you’re in the game and then it crashes. Want my money back or FIX THIS. This is absolutely ridiculous. Do not buy this.
Worst purchase I have ever made on minecraft, didn't work. It lags and crashes all the time
I had no lag or crashes bu ist might be bc i have a gaming pc but other than that it is nice

Advanced Mining Adventure has 2 MAJOR BUGS (DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PACK)

I use MC on Win10

1) Vehicle drills stop working after save and quitting then resuming, and there is absolutely NOTHING I can do to bring them back to life once this happens. HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT

I was very excited about this pack, and LOVED playing it.... until the drills stopped working on my vehicles. I can't keep buying new equipment to replace it over and over just because the drills quit working. I tried everything I could think of to jog the drill: getting a new key, refueling again, entering and exiting the vehicle, quitting the game and coming back in, but no luck..

2) LAG LAG LAG (aka Forget cross-platform CO-OP!!!)

Every time me and my son try loading in together it won't load for him. I'll just see his avatar, and we'll wait and wait and wait, but after 7 mins it's not even playable for him. At first I was just inviting him into my world, and I figured it might work if he had the pack on his xbox so it would load faster from his end. No, didn't work either. So we can't play together as mining buddies like I hoped.

This is sad because if it weren't for these major issues this pack could be really awesome. I loved what it could be while it lasted until my drills broke 3 days into owning this.
I want my money back right now I can't even get the drill to work and I spent time earning thoughts points on microsoft rewards!!

drills working perfect. problem is thr Truck not working ...

1) i cant make working that material refine outside of factory and i cant open menu (backpack) when i using or truck or after i drived truck..

2) Clyde - i cant get it out from factory - need treat with keys, what i did, but it is not moving out from factory

that is first issues or bugs what i see even not tried to check something else... seems like waste of money?! if not be fixed than i wish to receive money back (or refund) /playing on Win 10/ on Xbox not tryed start that pack (map)

Couple years ago i bought this pack. And since that day I'm unable to move C.L.Y.D.E out from factory and rss refiner doesn't work outside of factory. Please simebody take responsibility and fix those issues. Or do refunds...
